name: Land of Fantasy
description: Land of Fantasy Company Limited operates for entertainment and recreation purposes. Founded in 2015 with a registered capital of 100,000,000 baht. The company aims to develop its business into the digital age. Giving people access and utility from blockchain technology. Due to the current blockchain technology to play a greater role in terms of utilizing and extending to various businesses in various industries. The company has realized the importance of this. Therefore, it is determined to create new business models. To operate a digital asset business in the form of a Utility Token named LOF LAND TOKEN that focuses on the sustainable development of the network ecosystem and the infrastructure of blockchain technology. To distribute opportunities in this era of business development with this value technology, equally and can be used universally.
